sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react'
import {FloatingLabelsDate, FloatingLabelsEmail, FloatingLabelsPassword, FloatingLabelsPhone,
         FloatingLabelsUsername, SelectsGender, TextAreasDescription} from '@'
import {Container, Row, Col,Form   } from 'react-bootstrap'

class Test extends Component {

    constructor(props){
        super(props)

            this.state = {
                          email: 'bfdbff'     
            }
    }

    handleSubmit = (event)=>{
        console.log(this.state.email)
        event.preventDefault();
    }

    handleChange = (event) => {
        this.setState({
            [event.target.name] : event.target.value
    })
    }

    render() {
        return (

           <>

                <Container>
                <Form onSubmit={this.handleSubmit} noValidate>
                   <Row className="justify-content-md-center">

                        <Col lg="4">
                            <FloatingLabelsEmail handleChange={this.handleChange} val={this.state.email}/>
                        </Col>

                        <Col lg="4">
                            <FloatingLabelsDate/>
                        </Col>

                   </Row>
{/* 
                   <Row className="justify-content-md-center">

                        <Col    lg="8">

                            <FloatingLabelsEmail/>  

                        </Col>

                   </Row>

                    <Row className="justify-content-md-center">

                        <Col lg="4">
                            <FloatingLabelsEmail/>
                        </Col>

                        <Col lg="4">
                            <FloatingLabelsEmail/>
                        </Col>

                   </Row>

                    <Row className="justify-content-md-center">

                        <Col lg="4">
                            <FloatingLabelsEmail/>
                        </Col>

                        <Col lg="4">
                            <FloatingLabelsEmail/>
                        </Col>

                    </Row>

                    <Row className="justify-content-md-center">

                        <Col    lg="8">

                            <FloatingLabelsEmail/>  

                        </Col>

                   </Row> */}

                   <button type="submit" value="submit" > submit </button>
                   </Form>
                 </Container> 
                 
           </>

        )
    }
}

export default Test
